WorkItem.Description:
I have Bluetooth devices, all have SPP Service.
 
Scenario: 
Whenever I pair device using DevicePairingWizard.exe I am able to get both Incoming COM Port and Outgoing COM Port.
I want to write a program to create Incoming COM Port for the same device which is paired. 
COM Port created should be visible in Bluetooth Properties -> COM Ports and also in Device Manager like Windows Bluetooth Wizard does.
How to create and register COM Port to Bluetooth stack? How to set its direction?
Can I use WinCE APIs for my Application?
 
I have tried CreateFile
hComm = CreateFile(".\\COM" + PortNum, GENERIC_READ | GENERIC_WRITE, 0, 0, OPEN_EXISTING, FILE_ATTRIBUTE_NORMAL, 0);
I am unable to create COM Port and register it to existing bluetooth stack.
 
If I have a com port created using some 3rd party application then how to register it to bluetooth stack?
 
Platform I am using:
Operating System: Win Vista 32bit
Bluetooth Stack: Widcomm
WorkItem.Summary: Create Bluetooth Incoming com port in Desktop Application
